name: 「Dark Reader」 Int.net - Specific
description:
Used to make only some novels into a dark style reader layout
Other novels can be added by editing the style and targeting that novels specific address.
additional_info:
• Supported Novels:
  • Ascendance of a Bookworm
  • The Spearmaster and the Black Cat
  • Nidoume no Jinsei wo Isekai de
  • Hakai no Miko
  • Hachinan tte, Sore wa Nai Deshou!
  • Imperial Wars and My Stratagems
  • Kakei Senki Wo Kakageyo!
  • Maou no Utsuwa
  • Changelog:
  • Version 1.1
  • Added Support for more Novels.
  • Version 1.0
  • First Release.
